channel.title: Why do people bully one another ? hav u ever done it ?n hav u eva been bullyed
channel.description:
hav u ever dont it has it happened to u n wot did u do ?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 23, 2006, 05:27:46 PM[/size][hr]nobobdy [br][size=1]Posted at: August 23, 2006, 05:29:51 PM[/size][hr] :) plz sum body post or just say summin
[br][size=1]Posted at: August 23, 2006, 05:30:35 PM[/size][hr]weee heee ---- lol go eat ur head[br][size=1]Posted at: August 23, 2006, 05:36:11 PM[/size][hr]iiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii dont no

item.title: Why do people bully one another ? hav u ever done it ?n hav u eva been bullyed
item.dc:creator: @soul_raever soul raever
item.description:
@soul_raever wrote:

people try bullying me… it doent offend me because its normally of the past and im liveing now not then… i used 2 bully sum people because the bullying i got used to get 2 me but i stopped that but there is 1 person i do bully … he deserves it tho thinks hes so solid crew… 1 punch in the head and is curled up in the corner crying saying you broke his leg…(faggot) then he comes back gets all up in your face 2 get smaked again all just for the attention

o yea and 1ce he treid convinceing me i was going out with sum girl that i wasnt… i tried explaining to him for bout 2 hours how i wasnt but he just didnt listen

Read full topic

item.title: Why do people bully one another ? hav u ever done it ?n hav u eva been bullyed
item.dc:creator: @flamed_fury1 flamed fury1
item.description:
@flamed_fury1 wrote:

Got_Shine:

I’ve never been bullied. And I know I’ve bullied some, I didn’t realize it at the time. Its a part of life, “the Pecking Order”.

Same here.

Read full topic
